DOC.brief_summary: Comparison between intrathecal Dexmedetomidine versus Intraarticular Dexmedetomidine on postoperative pain after knee arthroscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Intrathecal vs Intraarticular Dexmedetomidine on Postoperative Pain Following Arthroscopy
DOC.criteria: Adult patients, ASA III, undergoing knee arthroscopy under spinal anesthesia. Absolute or relative contraindications to spinal anesthesia, allergy to dexmedetomidine or chronic pain treatment.
